channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Firefox ESR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Firefox ESR

item.title: CVE-2022-2505|2024-08-03T00:39:07.889Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20esr
item.description: Mozilla developers and the Mozilla Fuzzing Team reported memory safety bugs present in Firefox 102. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effort some of these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 102.1, Firefox < 103, and Thunderbird < 102.1.

item.title: CVE-2022-3266|2024-08-03T01:07:06.012Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20esr
item.description: An out-of-bounds read can occur when decoding H264 video. This results in a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 102.3, Thunderbird < 102.3, and Firefox < 105.

item.title: CVE-2022-1529|2024-08-03T00:10:03.467Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20esr
item.description: An attacker could have sent a message to the parent process where the contents were used to double-index into a JavaScript object, leading to prototype pollution and ultimately attacker-controlled JavaScript executing in the privileged parent process. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 91.9.1, Firefox < 100.0.2, Firefox for Android < 100.3.0, and Thunderbird < 91.9.1.

item.title: CVE-2022-1802|2024-08-03T00:17:00.467Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20esr
item.description: If an attacker was able to corrupt the methods of an Array object in JavaScript via prototype pollution, they could have achieved execution of attacker-controlled JavaScript code in a privileged context. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 91.9.1, Firefox < 100.0.2, Firefox for Android < 100.3.0, and Thunderbird < 91.9.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-2616|2024-08-01T19:18:48.123Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20esr
item.description: To harden ICU against exploitation, the behavior for out-of-memory conditions was changed to crash instead of attempt to continue. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 115.9 and Thunderbird < 115.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-2616|2024-03-19T12:02:58.997Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20esr
item.description: To harden ICU against exploitation, the behavior for out-of-memory conditions was changed to crash instead of attempt to continue. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 115.9 and Thunderbird < 115.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-2616|2024-07-05T17:21:11.755Z -- mozilla -- firefox%20esr
item.description: To harden ICU against exploitation, the behavior for out-of-memory conditions was changed to crash instead of attempt to continue. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 115.9 and Thunderbird < 115.9.
